name: example_weight_1
description: Example body weight of subject at the baseline visit.
dcc_harmonization_comments: This variable was harmonized by converting units to kg, when necessary.

harmonization_units.name: StudyA
harmonization_units.harmonization_function:
harmonize <- function(phen_list) {
  library(dplyr)
  source_data <- phen_list$source_data

  dataset <- source_data[["pht009922"]]

  dataset <- dataset %>%
    # Subset to non-missing values.
    filter(!is.na(WGTV1)) %>%
    # Rename variable.
    rename(example_weight = WGTV1, age = AGEV1)

  # Convert to numeric.
  dataset$example_weight <- as.numeric(dataset$example_weight)
  dataset$age <- as.numeric(dataset$age)

  # Return the final dataset.
  dataset

}

harmonization_units.name: StudyB
harmonization_units.harmonization_function:
harmonize <- function(phen_list) {
  library(dplyr)
  source_data <- phen_list$source_data

  age_dat <- source_data[["pht009955"]]

  dataset <- source_data[["pht009926"]]

  dataset <- dataset %>%
    # Subset to non-missing values.
    filter(!is.na(weight)) %>%
    # Merge with the age dataset.
    left_join(age_dat, by = "topmed_subject_id") %>%
    # Convert to numeric.
    mutate(
      example_weight = as.numeric(weight),
      age = as.numeric(age),
    ) %>%
    # Convert from pounds to kg.
    mutate(
      example_weight = example_weight / 2.2
    ) %>%
    # Select appropriate columns.
    select(topmed_subject_id, example_weight, age)

  # Return the final dataset.
  dataset

}
